It's 80 feet long, not tall mostly neck and tail with a big head to hold hi=
s EGO. His size doesn't really add to his power just his effect. Actually h=
's stronger in mass but not in muscletone. 

It was legal for Necromancer t=
o grow in beast mode, at one point four bots rode him back to the CF at onc=
e. If it was legal then then it should be legal now since Megaton has DNA f=
rom Necromancer. At one point when I was lent Necromancer he fought toe to =
toe with a gestault.

Many bots grow when they transform to thier alternate=
 modes most of them are more durable than Megaton, Astroblast becomes big e=
nough for other TF's to ride inside, the Target masters are big enough for =
5-6 foot humans to ride on, more than once Starscream has had other charact=
ers ride inside we have cars, jets, futuristic vehicles, Dinosaurs that are=
 over 15 feet I'm sure even though the robot modes only 1-16 feet. How is M=
egatons alternate form any different?
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, =
August 05, 2001 5:39 AM
  Subject: Re: After the pain. (OOC:)


  OOC: I th=
ink thats illegal to be "Huge" You cant be larger than 16 feet 
  unless it=
s a gestalt form. SO if megaton can grow to the same size he can 
  grow to=
 a maximum of 16 feet... Or at least thats what the rules say. 
  Your use =
of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
